components.name: Zipwhip Tools > Zipwhip Provisioner Dashboard and API
Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Multiple Brazil Networks Via Subset of Short Codes

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Multiple Brazil Networks. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Latin America

incidents.name: T-Mobile US API Errors Impacting Account Security Services

incident_updates.body: We continue experiencing issues with the T-Mobile US API which are impacting Account Security Services and causing Verify SNA down for T-Mobile apart from VERIFY tag. Our engineering team is actively working to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Unable to Receive OAuth Token From Stripe

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience issues with the 'Connect with Stripe' button on the Stripe Pay Connectors. New connections to Stripe are temporarily unavailable, we expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incident_updates.body: The 'Connect with Stripe' button on the Stripe Pay Connectors page is currently not functional. Twilio customers who have already connected their Twilio Stripe connector to their Stripe account are unaffected, and their ability to perform Stripe transactions remains fully operational. New connections to Stripe are temporarily unavailable, we expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Japan SMS Carrier Maintenance - NTT Docomo

incident_updates.body: The NTT Docomo network in Japan is conducting a planned maintenance from 15 January 2025 at 08:00 PST until 15 January 2025 at 13:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from NTT Docomo Japan handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Scheduled maintenance for Flex Legacy Messaging

incident_updates.body:
Maintenance Activity: We would be performing a Database version upgrade, in the US1 region.
We anticipate about 1 minute of downtime during the cutover to the newer version of the database.

Monitoring: Our team will closely watch the system performance during and after this maintenance window as well to ensure everything runs smoothly.

Contingency plan: In the unlikely event of encountering any issues, we are prepared to immediately revert the changes. Should a rollback be deemed necessary, then there could be a short downtime of approximately 2 minutes.

affected_components.name: FLEX - Flex Programmable Chat

scheduled_maintenances.name: Canada Account Security Service Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our service partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 15 January 2025 at 23:00 PST until 16 January 2025 at 03:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following carriers and country: Rogers Canada, Telus Canada, Bell Canada.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Planned Maintenance for Flex Insights Historical Reporting

incident_updates.body: The Flex Insights Historical Reporting dashboards visualisation partner in the US is conducting planned maintenance on Saturday, Jan 18th, 2025, at 1:00 AM Pacific Standard Time. The maintenance window is planned to take up to 13 hours. Maintenance is planned as no-downtime, but  there can be intermittent failures on loading Insights Historical Dashboards and ETLs uploads while the maintenance is in progress.

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our SMS carrier partner in Australia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 14 January 2025 at 12:00 PST until 26 January 2025 at 03:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Australia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

14 January 2025 at 12:00 PST until 21 January 2025 at 00:00 PST
15 January 2025 at 12:00 PST until 22 January 2025 at 02:00 PST
15 January 2025 at 17:00 PST until 20 January 2025 at 07:00 PST
16 January 2025 at 14:00 PST until 23 January 2025 at 11:00 PST
19 January 2025 at 12:00 PST until 26 January 2025 at 03:00 PST
